title: What time is Ted Lasso season 2 episode 3 released on Apple TV Plus?
author: tom-power
summary: Ted Lasso season 2 episode 3 wants you to believe
article: Update: Ted Lasso season 2 episode 3 is available now.
Spoilers follow for Ted Lasso season 2 episode 2.

Ted Lasso season 2 episode 3 is due to launch on Friday, August 6. The first two episodes in the second season of Apple TV Plus' huge hit have already created some intriguing plot threads and flash points, so we can expect plenty more in episode 3.

Episode 2 – aka Lavender – saw Jamie Tartt (Phil Dunster) make a shock return to AFC Richmond, which is sure to give Ted (Jason Sudeikis) a headache or two, especially when it comes to Sam Obisanya (Toheeb Jimoh).

Meanwhile, Roy Kent (Brett Goldstein) made a, well, interesting first impression during his maiden stint as a pundit on Sky Sports' Soccer Saturday, so we're bound to get a lot more of those foul-mouthed rants in upcoming episodes.
If you want to know when Ted Lasso season 2 episode 3 is due to air, we're here to help. Below, you'll find the release date and time for the next instalment, which is titled Do the Right-est Thing.
You'll also be able to find a full release schedule for season 2 further down the page, which will help you see when future entries will be released.
Read on to find out when the third episode of Ted Lasso season 2 arrives on Apple TV Plus.

Ted Lasso season 2 episode 3 will land on Apple TV Plus on Friday, August 6 at 12AM ET / 5AM BST. For US citizens on the Pacific coast, the next episode will be released at 9PM PT on Thursday, August 5.

Our Apple TV Plus press contact confirmed that while "our episodes usually launch very early in the morning, we don’t confirm timings". Season 2's first two entries launched around the times listed above, so episode 3 should do likewise.

Viewers on the US east coast, as well as UK and European fans, will have to stay up late (or get up early) to catch the next instalment. Those on the US west coast, though, should be able to watch it before they head to bed.

Do the Right-est Thing may sound like a grammatically incorrect title but, like the previous two episodes, there's a big reason behind it. See if you can work out what it means before, or during, the next entry.
Read on for the season's full release schedule.
Much like Disney Plus' TV show release schedule, Apple is adopting a weekly episodic launch for Ted Lasso season 2.
That means that there'll only be one episode per week, so Ted Lasso season 2 won't be released all at once.

Some fans may want to wait until the entire season is available to binge it all at once. If you do, though, you'll run the risk of having it spoiled for you, so ensure you mute any words related to 'Ted Lasso season 2' on your social media accounts.
